item.description:
The Plan:

1) Meet at Cafe Jaffa at 8pm for dinner and drinks. Jaffa is a very good Mid-East restaurant and the price is right! (48 Gloucester St, between Bolyston and Newbury, 617-536-0230)

2) Then head over to King's at 10pm (10 Scotia Street, next to the Boston Hilton Hotel). King's has billiards and bowling in a cool atmosphere.

This event should make meeting up easier and in a fun, laid back venue.

If you can't make dinner, you can find us at the pool tables at King's.

Be sure to RSVP, all are welcome. See you on Nov. 12! - Charlie

For more information, see http://boston.citysea...

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Night Life November - Shooting Pool at Kings
